desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.jp: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.thai: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.ko: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.zh_tw: 躲過黑市保鑣追擊,順利逃脫的對策委員會一行人。他們看到額數驚人的現金，頓時陷入苦惱。但是很快就被星野說服，決定只帶著部分需要文件逃跑。而他們留下的一捆捆現金，則被亞瑠和便利屋職員撿走。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的对策委员会一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被阿露和便利屋职员捡走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的对策委员会一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被亚瑠和便利屋职员捡走。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的对策委员会一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被亚瑠和便利屋职员捡走。

name.en: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.jp: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.thai: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.ko: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed

desc.en: When confirming the situation, everyone was surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wanted to use them to pay the debt, but was opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino said that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agreed to take away the documents only.
desc.jp: When confirming the situation, everyone was surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wanted to use them to pay the debt, but was opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino said that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agreed to take away the documents only.
desc.thai: When confirming the situation, everyone was surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wanted to use them to pay the debt, but was opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino said that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agreed to take away the documents only.
desc.ko: When confirming the situation, everyone was surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wanted to use them to pay the debt, but was opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino said that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agreed to take away the documents only.
desc.zh_tw: 確認情況時，眾人意外發現把近一億日元的鈔票也帶了出來。芹香與野乃美想要就此使用這些錢，卻遭到星野的嚴重反對，認為底線不可逾越。最終眾人決定只帶走檔案。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。芹香与野宫想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。芹香与野乃美想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。芹香与野乃美想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。

desc.en: Aru caught up suddenly and everyone returned to the "Masked Swimsuit Gang". Aru expressed the admiration towards them and said she wanted to be a villain just like them. Then the Problem Solver took away the money, and Aru was told the reality at the very end.
desc.jp: Aru caught up suddenly and everyone returned to the "Masked Swimsuit Gang". Aru expressed the admiration towards them and said she wanted to be a villain just like them. Then the Problem Solver took away the money, and Aru was told the reality at the very end.
desc.thai: Aru caught up suddenly and everyone returned to the "Masked Swimsuit Gang". Aru expressed the admiration towards them and said she wanted to be a villain just like them. Then the Problem Solver took away the money, and Aru was told the reality at the very end.
desc.ko: Aru caught up suddenly and everyone returned to the "Masked Swimsuit Gang". Aru expressed the admiration towards them and said she wanted to be a villain just like them. Then the Problem Solver took away the money, and Aru was told the reality at the very end.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠突然追了上來，眾人又回到了“蒙面泳裝團”狀態。亞瑠表達了對他們的仰慕，表示想要成為像他們那樣的壞蛋。之後便利屋拿走了阿拜多斯眾人搶出的一億日元，並最終還是被告知了情況。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露突然追了上来，众人又回到了“蒙面泳装团”状态。阿露表达了对他们的仰慕，表示想要成为像他们那样的坏蛋。之后便利屋拿走了阿拜多斯众人抢出的一亿日元，并最终还是被告知了情况。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠突然追了上来，众人又回到了“蒙面泳装团”状态。亚瑠表达了对他们的仰慕，表示想要成为像他们那样的坏蛋。之后便利屋拿走了阿拜多斯众人抢出的一亿日元，并最终还是被告知了情况。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠突然追了上来，众人又回到了“蒙面泳装团”状态。亚瑠表达了对他们的仰慕，表示想要成为像他们那样的坏蛋。之后便利屋拿走了阿拜多斯众人抢出的一亿日元，并最终还是被告知了情况。

desc.en: Yuuka visits the Game Development Department to screen their new member's eligibility. Aris practices the art of self-introduction with Midori and Momoi.
desc.jp: Yuuka visits the Game Development Department to screen their new member's eligibility. Aris practices the art of self-introduction with Midori and Momoi.
desc.thai: Yuuka visits the Game Development Department to screen their new member's eligibility. Aris practices the art of self-introduction with Midori and Momoi.
desc.ko: Yuuka visits the Game Development Department to screen their new member's eligibility. Aris practices the art of self-introduction with Midori and Momoi.
desc.zh_tw: 優香為了審查新成員的資格而來到遊戲開發部,於是愛麗 絲便與綠及桃井一起練習自我介紹。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香为了审查新成员的资格而来到游戏开发部,于是爱丽丝便与绿及桃井一起练习自我介绍。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香为了审查新成员的资格而来到游戏开发部,于是爱丽丝便与绿及桃井一起练习自我介绍。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香为了审查新成员的资格而来到游戏开发部,于是爱丽丝便与绿及桃井一起练习自我介绍。

desc.en: Momoi was confident that Aris would be able to pass the screening easily, while Midori didn't think so. Momoi then decided to test that, but the result was not looking good.
desc.jp: Momoi was confident that Aris would be able to pass the screening easily, while Midori didn't think so. Momoi then decided to test that, but the result was not looking good.
desc.thai: Momoi was confident that Aris would be able to pass the screening easily, while Midori didn't think so. Momoi then decided to test that, but the result was not looking good.
desc.ko: Momoi was confident that Aris would be able to pass the screening easily, while Midori didn't think so. Momoi then decided to test that, but the result was not looking good.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井自信地認為愛麗絲能夠通過優香的資格審查，而綠則對此仍有顧慮。桃井於是測試愛麗絲的能力，但仍然不很盡人意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井自信地认为爱丽丝能够通过优香的资格审查，而绿则对此仍有顾虑。桃井于是测试爱丽丝的能力，但仍然不很尽人意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井自信地认为爱丽丝能够通过优香的资格审查，而绿则对此仍有顾虑。桃井于是测试爱丽丝的能力，但仍然不很尽人意。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井自信地认为爱丽丝能够通过优香的资格审查，而绿则对此仍有顾虑。桃井于是测试爱丽丝的能力，但仍然不很尽人意。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Yuuka visited the Department and met Aris. Pretty surprised, she said that she had never met such an adorable child. Midori mentioned about the closure stuff; Yuuka said that due to a change on procedure, the eligibility review is inevitable. Yuuka immediately started her questioning.
desc.jp: Yuuka visited the Department and met Aris. Pretty surprised, she said that she had never met such an adorable child. Midori mentioned about the closure stuff; Yuuka said that due to a change on procedure, the eligibility review is inevitable. Yuuka immediately started her questioning.
desc.thai: Yuuka visited the Department and met Aris. Pretty surprised, she said that she had never met such an adorable child. Midori mentioned about the closure stuff; Yuuka said that due to a change on procedure, the eligibility review is inevitable. Yuuka immediately started her questioning.
desc.ko: Yuuka visited the Department and met Aris. Pretty surprised, she said that she had never met such an adorable child. Midori mentioned about the closure stuff; Yuuka said that due to a change on procedure, the eligibility review is inevitable. Yuuka immediately started her questioning.
desc.zh_tw: 優香視察遊戲開發部，遇見了愛麗絲。優香表示自己從來沒見過這麼可愛的孩子，桃井立刻提出廢社事宜。優香表示由於程序變更，資格審查不可避免；她隨即開始了對愛麗絲的提問。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香视察游戏开发部，遇见了爱丽丝。优香表示自己从来没见过这么可爱的孩子，桃井立刻提出废社事宜。优香表示由于程序变更，资格审查不可避免；她随即开始了对爱丽丝的提问。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香视察游戏开发部，遇见了爱丽丝。优香表示自己从来没见过这么可爱的孩子，桃井立刻提出废社事宜。优香表示由于程序变更，资格审查不可避免；她随即开始了对爱丽丝的提问。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香视察游戏开发部，遇见了爱丽丝。优香表示自己从来没见过这么可爱的孩子，桃井立刻提出废社事宜。优香表示由于程序变更，资格审查不可避免；她随即开始了对爱丽丝的提问。

desc.en: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.jp: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.thai: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.ko: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.zh_tw: 有一天，老師從貝里塔斯接獲發現可疑機器的訊息。前往貝里塔斯部室的途中，老師和遊戲開發部相遇，便一起調查機器的來歷。但大家都無法對機器的來歷做出結論…突然間，愛麗絲就像是被吸引般伸出手觸碰機器，機器啟動的同時，愛麗絲也發生了異變。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.thai: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.ko: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在千年廣場遇到了其他千年的學生，大家都很高興見到她。中途愛麗絲還收到了幾個支線任務，被以報酬的名義贈送了點心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

desc.en: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.jp: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.thai: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在校園裡見到了工程部三人，後者表示是出來蒐羅新裝備的。詠葉問愛麗絲光之劍近況如何，愛麗絲則表示在很愛護地使用著。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。歌原问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。

desc.en: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.jp: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.thai: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.ko: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲叫寧瑠“小不點”讓後者頗為不滿，但還是拽著老師和愛麗絲到了遊戲廳。不出所料，寧瑠不斷輸給了愛麗絲，儘管愛麗絲已經教了她相當一段時間。寧瑠雖然非常惱火愛麗絲評價她的水平不好，但還是請教愛麗絲連招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝叫尼禄“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，尼禄不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。尼禄虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.thai: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.ko: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.jp: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.thai: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.ko: With Sumire's help, Chihiro secures the Mirror from the contraband storage and succeeds in taking control of Eridu's network, and the Game Development Department seizes this moment to launch a counterattack.
desc.zh_tw: 千尋在堇的協助下，取得了位於扣押品保管所的「鏡子」，成功掌握了埃裡都的網路。遊戲開發部將此當作契機展開了反擊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 千寻在堇的协助下，取得了位于扣押品保管所的「镜子」，成功掌握了埃里都的网络。游戏开发部将此当作契机展开了反击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 千寻在堇的协助下，取得了位于扣押品保管所的「镜子」，成功掌握了埃里都的网络。游戏开发部将此当作契机展开了反击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 千寻在堇的协助下，取得了位于扣押品保管所的「镜子」，成功掌握了埃里都的网络。游戏开发部将此当作契机展开了反击。

desc.en: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department succeed in defeating the Avant Guard with the help of the Engineering Department, but the aftermath causes the Engineering Department to retire from combat. However, they continue cheering on the Game Development Department's forward charge.
desc.zh_tw: 因為工程師部的活躍表現，遊戲開發部成功擊倒了前衛君。但工程師部也因此必須退場了。遊戲開發部在倒下的工程師部的應援下繼續向前邁進。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为工程师部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程师部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程师部的应援下继续向前迈进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为工程师部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程师部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程师部的应援下继续向前迈进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为工程师部的活跃表现，游戏开发部成功击倒了前卫君。但工程师部也因此必须退场了。游戏开发部在倒下的工程师部的应援下继续向前迈进。

desc.en: Chihiro's appearance made everyone very excited. Others at Veritas also connected to the comm. Hare was very curious about how Chihiro did it, and Chihiro said lightly that it was the "Mirror" came in handy. Everyone remembered the confrontation between Yuzu and Neru at that time, and was amazed by the plan. Momoi questioned the means of retrieving it, and Sumire happened to connect to the comm. Despite the successful hacking, the firewall started making the communication unstable. Veritas promised that the communication would not be interrupted, and everyone continued to combat the Avant Guard.
desc.jp: Chihiro's appearance made everyone very excited. Others at Veritas also connected to the comm. Hare was very curious about how Chihiro did it, and Chihiro said lightly that it was the "Mirror" came in handy. Everyone remembered the confrontation between Yuzu and Neru at that time, and was amazed by the plan. Momoi questioned the means of retrieving it, and Sumire happened to connect to the comm. Despite the successful hacking, the firewall started making the communication unstable. Veritas promised that the communication would not be interrupted, and everyone continued to combat the Avant Guard.
desc.thai: Chihiro's appearance made everyone very excited. Others at Veritas also connected to the comm. Hare was very curious about how Chihiro did it, and Chihiro said lightly that it was the "Mirror" came in handy. Everyone remembered the confrontation between Yuzu and Neru at that time, and was amazed by the plan. Momoi questioned the means of retrieving it, and Sumire happened to connect to the comm. Despite the successful hacking, the firewall started making the communication unstable. Veritas promised that the communication would not be interrupted, and everyone continued to combat the Avant Guard.

Hare was very curious about how Chihiro did it, and Chihiro said lightly that it was the "Mirror" came in handy. Everyone remembered the confrontation between Yuzu and Neru at that time, and was amazed by the plan. Momoi questioned the means of retrieving it, and Sumire happened to connect to the comm. Despite the successful hacking, the firewall started making the communication unstable. Veritas promised that the communication would not be interrupted, and everyone continued to combat the Avant Guard.
desc.zh_tw: 千尋的出現讓大家振奮無比。貝里塔斯也連上了通訊。晴很好奇千尋是怎麼做到的，而千尋則輕鬆地表示是之前被沒收的“鏡子”派上了用場。眾人想起了當時柚子與寧瑠的交鋒，在場所有人無一不對這一計劃驚歎不已。桃井對如何取得表示疑問，而堇這時正好接入通訊。雖然成功駭入，但防火牆又使得通訊不穩定起來；貝里塔斯保證了通訊不再會被中斷，所有人則繼續迎戰前衛君。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 千寻的出现让大家振奋无比。贝里塔斯也连上了通讯。晴很好奇千寻是怎么做到的，而千寻则轻松地表示是之前被没收的“镜子”派上了用场。众人想起了当时柚子与尼禄的交锋，在场所有人无一不对这一计划惊叹不已。桃井对如何取得表示疑问，而堇这时正好接入通讯。虽然成功骇入，但防火墙又使得通讯不稳定起来；贝里塔斯保证了通讯不再会被中断，所有人则继续迎战前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 千寻的出现让大家振奋无比。贝里塔斯也连上了通讯。晴很好奇千寻是怎么做到的，而千寻则轻松地表示是之前被没收的“镜子”派上了用场。众人想起了当时柚子与宁瑠的交锋，在场所有人无一不对这一计划惊叹不已。桃井对如何取得表示疑问，而堇这时正好接入通讯。虽然成功骇入，但防火墙又使得通讯不稳定起来；贝里塔斯保证了通讯不再会被中断，所有人则继续迎战前卫君。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 千寻的出现让大家振奋无比。贝里塔斯也连上了通讯。晴很好奇千寻是怎么做到的，而千寻则轻松地表示是之前被没收的“镜子”派上了用场。众人想起了当时柚子与宁瑠的交锋，在场所有人无一不对这一计划惊叹不已。桃井对如何取得表示疑问，而堇这时正好接入通讯。虽然成功骇入，但防火墙又使得通讯不稳定起来；贝里塔斯保证了通讯不再会被中断，所有人则继续迎战前卫君。

desc.en: The Engineering Department put their "loudspeaker", a device that had been making for a half year and uncountable money, into use, and the result was amazing. Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department put their "loudspeaker", a device that had been making for a half year and uncountable money, into use, and the result was amazing. Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.
desc.thai: The Engineering Department put their "loudspeaker", a device that had been making for a half year and uncountable money, into use, and the result was amazing. Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.
desc.ko: The Engineering Department put their "loudspeaker", a device that had been making for a half year and uncountable money, into use, and the result was amazing. Yet the Engineering Department collapsed due to physical limitations. Sensei and GDD continued to move forward under the guidance of Chihiro.
desc.zh_tw: 工程部將自己花了半年和無數資金研發的揚聲器兼炸彈投入了使用，結果效果良好，“響度”極佳。然而工程部此時也因體力不支倒下，只剩下老師與遊戲開發部繼續前進。千尋繼續為眾人帶路。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部将自己花了半年和无数资金研发的扬声器兼炸弹投入了使用，结果效果良好，“响度”极佳。然而工程部此时也因体力不支倒下，只剩下老师与游戏开发部继续前进。千寻继续为众人带路。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程部将自己花了半年和无数资金研发的扬声器兼炸弹投入了使用，结果效果良好，“响度”极佳。然而工程部此时也因体力不支倒下，只剩下老师与游戏开发部继续前进。千寻继续为众人带路。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部将自己花了半年和无数资金研发的扬声器兼炸弹投入了使用，结果效果良好，“响度”极佳。然而工程部此时也因体力不支倒下，只剩下老师与游戏开发部继续前进。千寻继续为众人带路。
